name: three

scripts.build-closure: rollup -c utils/build/rollup.config.js && google-closure-compiler --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs utils/build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min.js
scripts.test: npm run test-lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-lint: eslint src --ext js --ext ts && tsc -p utils/build/tsconfig.lint.json
scripts.test-lint-examples: eslint examples/jsm --ext js --ext ts --ignore-pattern libs && tsc -p utils/build/tsconfig-examples.lint.json
scripts.test-unit: npm run build-test && qunit -r failonlyreporter test/unit/three.source.unit.js
